message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. This seems fair considering the time pressure and inflation.
I think we can both do better.  Let's split it closer to 50/50. This way, we both get a decent amount and still have time to see how the inflation plays out.
Bob, time is ticking and inflation is eating our potential gains.  I'll take a slight hit from my previous offer and meet you in the middle.  $55 for me, $45 for you.  Let's close this deal.
